body:
If there is an additional package repository and that repository overrides a builtin virtual dependency provider (e.g. we have a custom repo with our own implementation of `mpich`), Spack still tries to use the builtin package. This PR implements one of the possible (and hopefully working) solutions to this problem.

The deleted lines look strange: if `candidates` is empty we provide its first element to the constructor of the exception class.
title: Account for the order of repos when sorting virtual dep providers
